txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Flawed goo from the insects and spiders in the central Lone-lands. Bring the goo to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth.
'A strange request, yes, but there are scholars among us who can discern how to better protect our people from the toxins within these creatures.\n\n'Thank you.'
'This is an odd request to obtain the goo dropped by spiders and insects. Scholars of our people will study this substance for better insight into the toxic nature of these creatures.'
Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth desires flawed goo from the spiders found throughout the central and eastern Lone-lands.
Deliver the flawed goo to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth
You accepted a task from Frideric the Elder to acquire flawed goo from the insects in the central and eastern Lone-lands. You can find Frideric the Elder within Ost Guruth.
Wanted: Flawed goo from the insects and spiders in the central Lone-lands.
